title: The Red Baron and Early Flyboys During WWI
description: by Tom Clavin To celebrate the signing of the Treaty of Versailles, which ended WWI on June 28, 1919, author Tom Clavin shares with The History Reader the story of the Red Baron and other early flyboys whose dangerous missions helped bring WWI to an end. This past April was the 107th anniversary of the [â€¦] The post The Red Baron and Early Flyboys During WWI appeared first on The History Reader.
author: Sara Beth Haring
